item.description:
There are lots of events on this Haunted Shipyard Tour.  Cost is $15/person and you pay at the Pier 23 at Newport Yachting Club that evening.  Unfortunately, they don't do group rates.  For more details on the events that you will see, go to www.HauntedShipyard.com.  This will be my first time going.  The event ends at 10:30pm.  Their phone number is 846-1600 and their email is: scareme@thehauntedshipyard.com.

It is also offered Halloween weekend if you can't make it through Halloween.  Check their website for times for different days of the week.

Hope you can join us!
item.name: The Haunted Shipyard
